description.en: This process visualizes statistical analysis results, where the test value (stat.value) is plotted on the Y-axis and id are plotted on the X-axis. Bar color is determined by groups and is displayed in the legend. Bar opacity is controlled by the p-value threshold, with translucent bars representing insignificant results based on the provided p_value_threshold.

data.title: Input table
data.description: The input table containing statistical analysis results. The table must include columns for test values, p-values, and group identifiers.

id_col.title: Column name for identifier
id_col.description: The name of the column containing group or sample identifiers, e.g., polygon id. Default = "polygon_id"

test_value.title: Column name for test value
test_value.description: The name of the column containing the test values (e.g., statistical coefficients) to be plotted on the Y-axis, e.g., Tau for Mann-Kendall test. Default = "value".

p_value.title: Column name for p value
p_value.description: The name of the column containing p values, used to determine bar transparency. Default = "p_value"

p_value_threshold.title: p value threshold for significance
p_value_threshold.description: The threshold for distinguishing significant from insignificant values. It adjusts the transparency of bars in the plot. Default = 0.05

group.title: Column name for subgroups
group.description: The name of the column that defines the subgroups or categories to be displayed on the X-axis, e.g., seasons for every polygon_id. Default = "group"

barplot_image.title: Barplot image (DPI 300)
barplot_image.description: A high-resolution bar plot image (DPI = 300) where the Y-axis shows the test value and the X-axis shows the id and its groups. Opacity of bars is determined by the significance of the p-values based on the p_value_threshold.
